results.abstract: Boulder, Colo, C of C sponsors annual hike to Arapaho Glacier; glacier described; illus

headline.main: HIKERS SET TO CONQUER ARAPAHO GLACIER AGAIN; Small Investment Conference Center On to Boulder Canyon

results.snippet: BOULDER, Colo. The 25th annual public hike to the Arapaho Glacier will take place next Sunday. The  event, which is sponsored by the Boulder Chamber of Commerce, has grown steadily in popularity since its inception.
results.lead_paragraph: BOULDER, Colo. The 25th annual public hike to the Arapaho Glacier will take place next Sunday. The event, which is sponsored by the Boulder Chamber of Commerce, has grown steadily in popularity since its inception.

headline.main: FILM TO PRECEDE ASTRONAUT NOVEL; Author and Producer Seek to 'Protect the Plot' Stevens on Moscow Director Meets Convention 'Thrill' at Box Office

results.snippet: Screen rights to "The Astro-! nauts," a novel by Niven Busch have been bought by Lester Cowan, the producer, who will make the film next year before the book's publication. Mr. Busch will write the movie adaptation after visiting space installations...
results.lead_paragraph: Screen rights to "The Astro-! nauts," a novel by Niven Busch have been bought by Lester Cowan, the producer, who will make the film next year before the book's publication. Mr. Busch will write the movie adaptation after visiting space installations at Houston, Cape Canaveral and Huntsville, Ala., and after studying official space-flight films.

headline.main: TELEVISION GRAPHICS--A LITTLE IMAGERY WITH THE WORDS; Moving Map His Start

results.snippet: BEN BLANK has an average of five seconds and six words in which to tell a story on television. In  this circumscribed framework he has shown how an astronaut's capsule orbits the earth or floats in the ocean awaiting recovery after space flight, what...
results.lead_paragraph: BEN BLANK has an average of five seconds and six words in which to tell a story on television. In this circumscribed framework he has shown how an astronaut's capsule orbits the earth or floats in the ocean awaiting recovery after space flight, what progress a Presidential motorcade is making through the city and how two modern ocean liners collided near New York Harbor.

headline.main: Astronauts' Stories Saught for $800,000; ASTRONAUTS GET $800,000 OFFER Price Is Major Factor

results.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 25-- Life magazine is negotiating with the 16 astronauts to buy the personal stories of their space flights leading to a moon landing. The price could run as high as $800,000.

byline.original: By JOHN W. FINNEY Special to the New-York Times

results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 25-- Life magazine is negotiating with the 16 astronauts to buy the personal stories of their space flights leading to a moon landing. The price could run as high as $800,000.
